text: Since the inception of the Chinese Super League, in 2004, 75 players have scored three goals (a hat-trick) or more in a single match. The first player to achieve the feat was Guo Hui, who scored three times for Liaoning in a 5–2 victory over Shanghai Shenhua. ==Hat-tricks== Wu Lei scored six hat-tricks for Shanghai SIPG. Elkeson scored six hat-tricks, five for Guangzhou Evergrande Taobao and one for Shanghai SIPG. Eran Zahavi scored five hat-tricks for Guangzhou R&F.; Demba Ba scored three hat-tricks for Shanghai Greenland Shenhua. Li Jinyu scored three hat-tricks for Shandong Luneng Taishan. :Note: The results column shows the scorer's team score first. Teams in bold are home teams. {| class="wikitable sortable" ! # !!
